Subject: Configuring HTTPS for the web admin console
Description: We are configuring the web admin console to use HTTPS using the documentation that was provided by your team. Can you advise what web server NEA runs on in order to generate the cert â€“ Apache? Tomcat? Thanks!
What_We_Know__c: The customer wants to know about the webserver being used for NEA Reporting console so they can generate SSL certificates.
Solution_Comment__c:
Query
You wanted to know web server architecture used by Netwrix Enterprise Auditor's reporting module.

Answer
The reporting module using MS HTTPAPI for servicing web. Also, there is not much difference when it comes to SSL certificates as long as it supports
